PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1990-04541990-03-080,  ,  FIN,  , 
PrecisApprove a change in the authorized common share capital of BANK OF MONTREAL from 200,000,000 common shares with no par value for a consideration of $5,500,000,000 to an unlimited number of common shares with no par value for consideration of $5,500,000,000.
